item.title: iPad ad blocking using privoxy
item.description: I recently acquired an iPad 2 which I use mostly for surfing the web. I had no idea that you could not use browser extensions. Assuming you have an extra computer running on your network. One method of blocking ads (on your home network) is to use a web proxy like Privoxy. Privoxy has binaries for Windows, OS X, BSD and Linux. In the example below we are going to install and setup Privoxy on Ubuntu.
